jchess

Class Chessboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • jchess.Chessboard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Chessboard
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Class to represent chessboard. Chessboard is made from squares. It is setting the squers of chessboard and sets the pieces(pawns) witch the owner is current player on it.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
